articles.headline: Short-handed Lakers win at Portland with help of Nick Smith Jr.
articles.description: Playing without Luka Doncic and Austin Reaves, the Lakers won at Portland on Monday night behind a combined 57 points from starters Deandre Ayton and Rui Hachimura and an unexpected 25-point performance from reserve guard Nick Smith Jr.

images.alt: Short-handed Lakers win at Portland with help of Nick Smith Jr.

articles.headline: Oklahoma City plays Los Angeles, seeks 4th straight road win
articles.description: Oklahoma City Thunder (7-0, first in the Western Conference) vs. Los Angeles Clippers (3-2, ninth in the Western Conference)

images.alt: Oklahoma City plays Los Angeles, seeks 4th straight road win

articles.headline: Toronto plays Milwaukee in conference showdown
articles.description: Milwaukee Bucks (4-2, third in the Eastern Conference) vs. Toronto Raptors (3-4, eighth in the Eastern Conference)

images.alt: Toronto plays Milwaukee in conference showdown

vids.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo calls game with a sweet jumper to lift the Bucks over the Pacers.
